title: A Glimmer of Power
goal: Kaelen uses dormant magic in a confrontation, confirming his abilities and the threat's power.

beats.summary: A corrupted creature or cultist, drawn by the nexus's weakened state, attacks Kaelen and Elara.
Kaelen, in a moment of desperation, unleashes a forgotten spell or technique, decisively defeating the foe.
This display of power confirms Kaelen's identity as a true sage and the tangible danger of the Blight to Elara.
